amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the account for Departmental Administration by $60,500,000 and to increase the account for EERE by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the account for Departmental Administration by $60, 500,000 and to increase the account for EERE by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wu amendment (A028) Failed by recorded vote: 196 - 228 (Roll no. 550).
